title: How to find out your RAM specs on Windows 11 PCs
content:
Having a large enough amount of RAM is important if you want to have a smooth experience with your PC. RAM, or random access memory) is extremely fast memory that temporarily stores files you need super-fast access to, and the more of it you have, the more files it can store. That means you’re able

The post How to find out your RAM specs on Windows 11 PCs appeared first on XDA.
description: If you're not sure what kind of RAM is inside your PC, Windows 11 gives you a way to easily find out the specs of the memory.
